node.doctext:
Tell us a bit about yourself...

[% return "...first, you'd better log in." if (htmlcode("isGuest")); my $csr = $DB->sqlSelectMany('registry.registry_id','registry, registration WHERE registry.registry_id = registration.for_registry GROUP BY registration.for_registry', '','ORDER BY registration.tstamp DESC LIMIT 100') || return 'SQL Error (prepare). Please notify a [coder]'; my $str="
    "; while(my $ref = $csr->fetchrow_hashref()){ my $id = $$ref{registry_id}; $str.="
  • ".linkNode($id)."
    • " } $str.="
"; $str.="

(Registries are listed in order of most recent entry)

"; return $str; %]
node.title: The Registries
